lyric:
[by:维尔日记]
[00:00.000] 作曲 : Andrew Goldstein/Ari Leff/Matthew Musto
[00:00.331] 作词 : Andrew Goldstein/Ari Leff/Matthew Musto
[00:00.994]Yeah, yeah
[00:05.595]If I were you and you were me
[00:08.414]I would say goodbye, turn around and leave
[00:11.406]I'd do it all so differently
[00:14.201]If I were you and you were me
[00:17.649]Yeah
[00:18.474]I would get up in the middle of a dinner, pour a drink on your head
[00:21.851]I would never clean the room and I would never make the bed
[00:24.942]'Cause if you knew the bullshit I was pullin' in the past
[00:28.008]If I were you I'd never let me stab you in the back, yeah
[00:32.851]And I wonder if we flipped the script, I wouldn't be such a d!ck
[00:35.900]If I was you and you was me, I wouldn't put up with the sh!t
[00:38.855]But why is it we hurt each other? Why we so depressed and sh!t?
[00:41.810]If I were you and you were me
[00:44.680]I would say goodbye, turn around and leave
[00:47.518]I'd do it all so differently
[00:50.412]If I were you and you were me
[00:53.275]If I were you, I'd look at me
[00:56.373]See through the all the lies, turn around and leave
[00:59.083]I'd do it all so differently
[01:01.955]If I were you, and you were me (Yeah, yeah)
[01:04.617]We never even kissed, yeah I would change it
[01:07.934]You went back to your ex, I fvckin' hate that
[01:10.570]The second that I showed any emotion (Emotion)
[01:13.533]You cut me off, I guess that's just the motion (The motion), yeah
[01:16.967]Good God, you so mean
[01:19.806]Girl I found you and you were me
[01:22.747]I would never  leave your heart this broken
[01:25.548]This love is so annoying
[01:28.144]If I were you and you were me
[01:30.807]I would say goodbye, turn around and leave
[01:33.763]I'd do it all so differently
[01:36.625]If I were you and you were me
[01:39.514]If I were you, I'd look at me
[01:42.400]See through the all the lies, turn around and leave
[01:45.256]I'd do it all so differently
[01:48.135]If I were you and you were me
[01:51.037]If I were you, ooh, ooh, ooh, ooh
[01:53.595]If I were you, ooh, ooh, ooh, ooh
[01:56.489]If I were you, ooh, ooh, ooh, ooh
[01:59.229]If I were you, ooh, ooh, ooh, ooh
[02:04.019]Yeah (Yeah)
[02:05.533]And I wonder if we flipped the script, I wouldn't be such a d!ck
[02:08.064]If I was you and you was me, I wouldn't put up with the sh!t
[02:11.074]But why is it we hurt each other? Why we so depressed and sh!t?
[02:14.237]If I were you and you were me
[02:17.058]I would say goodbye, turn around and leave
[02:19.892]I'd do it all so differently
[02:22.806]If I were you and you were me (If I were you, ooh, ooh, ooh, ooh)
[02:25.572]If I were you, I'd look at me (If I were you, ooh, ooh, ooh, ooh)
[02:28.667]See through the all the lies, turn around and leave
[02:31.476]I'd do it all so differently
[02:34.316]If I were you, and you were me
[02:37.210]If I were you, ooh, ooh, ooh, ooh
[02:40.122]If I were you, ooh, ooh, ooh, ooh (I'd do it all so differently)
[02:42.887]If I were you, ooh, ooh, ooh, ooh
[02:45.665]If I were you, ooh, ooh, ooh, ooh
[02:48.719]Yeah
[02:51.540]Yeah, yeah
[02:59.325]Ooh, ooh, ooh, ooh
tlyric:
[by:维尔日记]
[00:00.994]
[00:05.595]倘若我是你 而你是我
[00:08.414]我将挥手道别 转身离去
[00:11.406]我或是会以不同方式处理
[00:14.201]倘若我是你 而你是我
[00:17.649]
[00:18.474]晚饭吃到一半 我会突然起身 泼你一身酒
[00:21.851]我既不会清扫房间 也不会整理床铺
[00:24.942]因为如果你知道我曾经那段胡扯的废话
[00:28.008]倘若我是你 我也不会让自己暗地中伤你
[00:32.851]我也寻思着如果我们早能互相坦明观点 我也不会是这般模样
[00:35.900]倘若我是你 而你是我 我定是无法容忍的
[00:38.855]但为何我们要互相伤害 为何我们如此沮丧和差劲
[00:41.810]倘若我是你 而你是我
[00:44.680]我将挥手道别 转身离去
[00:47.518]我或是会以不同方式处理
[00:50.412]倘若我是你 而你是我
[00:53.275]倘若我是你 我将注视着自己
[00:56.373]看穿翩飞谎言 随即转身离去
[00:59.083]我或是会以不同方式处理
[01:01.955]倘若我是你 而你是我
[01:04.617]我们甚至会从未亲密激吻过 因为我不会让此发生
[01:07.934]看着你回去找你前任 我内心很不是滋味
[01:10.570]那刻我终是将自己百感交集的内心所表露
[01:13.533]或许这就是你与我一刀两断所留下的伤痛吧
[01:16.967]上帝啊 你为何对我如此不公
[01:19.806]女孩 我终是发现了我就是你 而你成了我
[01:22.747]我永远都不会令你如此心碎欲绝
[01:25.548]这份爱太沉重了 难以担待
[01:28.144]倘若我是你 而你是我
[01:30.807]我将挥手道别 转身离去
[01:33.763]我或是会以不同方式处理
[01:36.625]倘若我是你 而你是我
[01:39.514]倘若我是你 我将注视着自己
[01:42.400]看穿翩飞谎言 随即转身离去
[01:45.256]我或是会以不同方式处理
[01:48.135]倘若我是你 而你是我
[01:51.037]倘若我是你
[01:53.595]倘若我是你
[01:56.489]倘若我是你
[01:59.229]倘若我是你
[02:04.019]
[02:05.533]我也寻思着如果我们早能互相坦明观点 我也不会是这般模样
[02:08.064]倘若我是你 而你是我 我定是无法容忍的
[02:11.074]但为何我们要互相伤害 为何我们如此沮丧和差劲
[02:14.237]倘若我是你 而你是我
